__e: He said, "Dad... if you ever wanted to do anything for me... do this."
Was there ever something that you wanted to do with your life that you never got a chance to do?
So, if there's something that you've always wanted to do - anything -
(groans) You know the last time you didn't want to go somewhere this much?
When you wanted to go to work for the State Department, I said no.
- Mike's a nice guy, but you were never that into him.
You knew this would happen and you wanted to come anyway?
Well, I get it now why you didn't want to come home again that whole time.
Okay, you wanted to come here because you saw the evidence of a young Earth by what we found here.
He's-- He's here because you wanted him to be here.
When you wanted me to go to church, I didn't want to, but I went because I knew it was important to you.
I know I'm not who you wanted me to be.
What did you mean the other dress wasn't me?
Oh, Roger, I see what you mean about life is to be savored.
That's what you meant by "I'm a good man"?
That's what you meant by "I'm a good man"?
I don't know if you meant it, but... If you still feel... If there's a shred left, then...
So what you're saying is that you didn't mean any of it.
And you didn't want to be a doctor, so--
You never wanted to be anybody's girlfriend, and now you're somebody's wife.
He can make you everything you ever wanted to be.
